name: Brompton Split Corp. Preferred Share ETF
longDescription: This actively managed ETF seeks to provide monthly distributions; and the opportunity for capital preservation primarily through investment in a portfolio of preferred shares of split share corporations. The ETF may also invest in preferred shares of other issuers, exchange-traded funds, other investment funds, equities or income-generating securities, and securities that are convertible into any of the above noted securities. The fund objective is to make investment in preferred shares.
